item.title: Red Mage Openers
item.description: In each opener, the first number refers to which GCD Embolden is used at, and the second refers to which GCD Manafication is used at. item.title: Red Mage Basic Guide
item.description: Overview The bare minimum to playing Red Mage is simply building your Mana to 80|80 and then unleashing your melee combo with a powerful finisher. The core rotation of the job has not changed very much since its inception in Stormblood, and if you are already familiar with the fundamentals of the job you may wish to focus on the 5.x changes and additions to the job section of the guide.
